scripts.version-prompt: node -e "const semver = require('semver'); const prompt = require('prompt'); const currentVersion = require('./package.json').version; prompt.start(); prompt.get({ properties: { version: { description: `Current version is ${currentVersion}. Enter the version (press Enter to keep current or specify major, minor, patch):` } } }, (err, result) => { const newVersion = result.version.trim(); console.log(semver.valid(newVersion) ? newVersion : currentVersion); })"
scripts.commit: npm run stage && npm run version-prompt --ignore-scripts && node -e "const semver = require('semver'); const currentVersion = require('./package.json').version; const newVersion = semver.valid(process.env.npm_package_prompt_version?.trim()) || currentVersion; require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(Object.assign(require('./package.json'), { version: newVersion }), null, 2));" && npm run cz
